name: Sect And Monsters
description:
This is an idle game in which a team of 4 people is formed to grind equipment + collect and produce resources, and develop equipment and characters.
In ancient times, there was a powerful sect that was guarding the peace of this land. However, this time the world has changed, the monsters are particularly ferocious. When the sect is about to survive, you are here. It is up to you to run this sect and shoulder all responsibilities. .
  • The sect is divided into three parts: servant disciples, cultivators, and elders.
  • You can recruit handyman disciples to chop down trees, dig mines, and collect spiritual stones. The resources obtained can be used to upgrade the sect and recruit monks.
  • You can recruit alchemists to refine blood recovery pills and experience pills for disciples to use.
  • You can recruit Qi Refining Monks, Foundation Establishment Monks, and Nascent Soul Monks to fight monsters and obtain resources and equipment.
  • You can recruit elders to increase the overall buff.
  • You can upgrade your sect and train monks to make them stronger.
  • You can collect magic weapons and artifacts to enhance your sect’s combat strength.
  • Equipment synthesis, gem embedding.
